item.title: @elonmusk: Good morning everyone! Our petition to cancel the puberty blockers trial stands at over 38,000 signa...
item.description: Good morning everyone! Our petition to cancel the puberty blockers trial stands at over 38,000 signatures in less than 48 hours! At this pace, we will hit 100,000 in a matter of days and force a parliamentary debate. Please share as wide as you can.petition.parliament.uk/petitâ€¦

item.title: @elonmusk: 1M people have signed a petition demanding a General Election Parliament debates it on Monday People...
item.description: 1M people have signed a petition demanding a General Election Parliament debates it on Monday People are getting sick of this Labour Government Is this the beginning of the end for Keir Starmer?

item.title: @elonmusk: Grokipedia is scaling insanely fast and getting better every single day In the last 10 days alone, G...
item.description: Grokipedia is scaling insanely fast and getting better every single day In the last 10 days alone, Grokipedia added around ~400k articles per day, totaling over 4M, while Wikipedia added just ~500 per dayâ€”that's about 15K a month Grokipedia is one step closer to the â€œEncyclopedia Galactica,â€ rewriting how humanity captures and explores knowledge in real time

item.title: @elonmusk: President Trump's withdrawal from 66 international organizations sends a clear message that it is no...
item.description: President Trump's withdrawal from 66 international organizations sends a clear message that it is no longer acceptable to invest the American people's hard-earned tax dollars in institutions that cannot demonstrate results, accountability, or respect for our national interests.

item.title: @elonmusk: We will make the new ğ• algorithm, including all code used to determine what organic and advertising ...
item.description: We will make the new ğ• algorithm, including all code used to determine what organic and advertising posts are recommended to users, open source in 7 days. This will be repeated every 4 weeks, with comprehensive developer notes, to help you understand what changed.
